page.title: 07HOUSE PRICES JULY 1985
page.content: There was a wide variation in the prices of the houses offered by Estate Agents in the area. There were a few 2 bedroomed houses with a lounge, kitchen, central heating, a small garden and a parking place all for Â£37000 The medium price range was Â£56000-Â£84000. A semi-detached house in this group had 4 spacious bedrooms, 2 reception rooms, a large kitchen, 2 bathrooms, gas central heating and a garage. The most expensive houses were in the Coombe Hill area and they ranged in price from Â£130000 to Â£700000. The Â£700000 house had 1.25 acres of land around it, 6 bedrooms with fitted cupboards, a fully fitted kitchen, tiled bathrooms and the Estate Agent's picture showed a lounge with a gold-plated chandelier and many luxury
